name: Gold Plunger
description:
Description

A game about a ghost with a plunger that catches gold in 1 minute.

More info

Made with Python and Pygame in 3 days, for Mini Jam 85: Gold.

The game is open source and you can check the source code here:
Game source: https://github.com/gnevesdev/gold-plunger

Gameplay

You control a ghost trying to catch gold in 1 minute. Use your plunger to catch as much gold as possible. You can use power-ups to slow down the time.
